page.title: 07Arable Farming at New House
page.content: { Mr Boffey has all the best {farming machinary for cultivating cereals (all very expensive to buy, but all very essential{daily work}.) He ploughs in the Autumn using broad tyres on his tractor so he does not get stuck in muddy ground.In Spring there is more ploughing.He grows only Wheat and Barley. Thoughout the Spring and Summer he watchs his crops,{spraying} with fertilizer, weedkiller and pesticides when needed.He always drives up the same tracks but uses narrower tyres as the ground dries. When the cereals are ripe Mr Boffey and his worker harvest them with a {combine-harvester}. Then they take the grain to the drying machine in the barn and pass it throughto dry it.It is then stored in huge bins until sold.
